title: Content entry from website to webforms
snippet:
We are working on a migration of website content and we have a list of pages that we need you to go to and grab content from to then put in to some forms that will house the new content. Its a lot of copy paste type stuff but important to us that it is done right. 

Please apply if you can start now and work during the day today (US time). We will probably hire a couple of people to work together on this. We can communicate as a group using Slack.

you wont be coding any html but it is kinda helpful if you know some basics of html and formatting so we can make sure as we copy and paste that the content is moving over correctly.
